title: Derivation
description: A Nix derivation, which is an evaluated (not realized) derivation.

attributePath.title: Attributepath
attributePath.description: Attribute path from the flake derivation set

derivationPath.title: Derivationpath
derivationPath.description: The derivation path of this derivation

outputPath.title: Outputpath
outputPath.description: The output path of this derivation

outputs.title: Outputs
outputs.description: A list of the derivation's output paths

parsedName.title: Parsedname
parsedName.description: The parsed derivation name and version of the derivation by Nix builtins

nixpkgsMetadata.title: Nixpkgsmetadata
nixpkgsMetadata.description: Optional metadata specific to derivations from nixpkgs

Output.title: Output
Output.description: An output of a derivation, as specified for multi-output derivations.

name.title: Name
name.description: The output path's name (out, doc, dev, ...)

ParsedName.title: ParsedName
ParsedName.description: The parsed output of the builtins.parseDrvName function.

name.title: Name
name.description: The derivation name of the Nix derivation

version.title: Version
version.description: The version of the Nix derivation

NixpkgsMetadata.title: NixpkgsMetadata
NixpkgsMetadata.description: Derivation metadata defined by nixpkgs specifically.

pname.title: Pname
pname.description: The pname attribute of the Nix derivation

broken.title: Broken
broken.description: Flag indicating whether the derivation is broken

BuildInputType.title: BuildInputType
BuildInputType.description: The type of build input. In Nix there are three different types.

BuildInput.title: BuildInput
BuildInput.description: A build input to a Nix derivation

attributePath.title: Attributepath
attributePath.description: Attribute path from the flake derivation set

outputPath.title: Outputpath
outputPath.description: The output path of the input derivation
